item.description:
Ellen Shapiro, accomplished ATC and Altered Artist, will lead the session on ATCs. She will share the logistical requirements of these mini works of art as well as cover some basics techniques and show us her amazing designs.

The session will run from 12-2:30pm. We hope that this will become the 1st in a series of ATC meetups. Please see the material list below and feel free to bring materials to share with the group. Beverages will be provided and feel free to bring any treats or beverages of your choice.

Artist Trading Cards (ATCs)
Date: August 2 at 12:30pm
Duration: 2 hours
Please be sure to call Abeille at 617.232.4343 to register
Fee: $15, some supplies included, others available for purchase or see below:

Available for purchase or bring along:
- double stick tape suitable for scrap booking
- misc stickers
- a variety of scrap book papers

Fun materials to bring:
- fibers
- paints of some kind (acrylic or watercolor)
- magazine images and/or photo graphs
- tickets, interesting paper wrappers, ephemera
- lace
- Fortune cookie fortunes

Supplies available for use:
- card stock
- ink pads
- glue sticks
- paper punches
- scissors
- misc rubber stamps
- 1 craft knife (and pad)
- 1 cutter

group.name: Greater Boston Jewelry Design and DIY Crafts Meetup Group

item.name: ATCs (Artist Trading Cards) 101 - Save the Date
